item.title: About Entrepreneurship
item.description: Entrepreneurship is such a magic word that can either change reality or, it is at least, what some people think it does. With hype words and sex meaning, many people believe that entrepreneurship itâ€™s the key to develop or increase value in society. It seems that people create a mythology around the entrepreneur and their performance on a regular basis. Anyone can be an entrepreneur, investing time and money and success is guaranteed.
